Hardin:
Print Transform magically to save the information and energy of the soul that is necessary to maintain the appearance of a living creature...
Unfortunately, I can't link this Print of Transformation with your body. It's just not my specialty...
However, the Magician transformations of the avant-garde will be able to configure the Print Conversion. You will find it in the Ivory Tower.
If you pass it the value of Print, detailed method of preparation and the energy of the magic transformation, he will be able to create for You Print.
